item.title: Flickr Gallery for facebook.
item.description: So I decided to jump in and write a facebook application. It was really fun and pretty easy. For those of you who haven’t been following this, Facebook released development kit for their site that allows third parties to develop applications that reside inside of facebook’s website. It is pretty nifty. So I used the framework I currently write software with. A mix of smarty and a solid DB abstraction layer, and modified it to work with facebook.
